law.catch_line: A person, with intent to defraud another, may not issue or publish as true a counterfeit instrument ...

text.section: A person, with intent to defraud another, may not issue or publish as true a counterfeit instrument or document listed in § 8-601 of this subtitle.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 10 years or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
